Generation VII.Sun: It is born asleep, and it dies asleep. All its movements are apparently no more than the results of it tossing and turning in its dreams.
Generation VII.Moon: The log it holds was given to it by its parents at birth. It has also been known to cling to the arm of a friendly Trainer.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It stays asleep from the moment it's born. When it falls into a deep sleep, it stops moving altogether.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It remains asleep from birth to death as a result of the sedative properties of the leaves that form its diet.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Komala spends its entire life sleeping. It feeds on leaves that contain a potent poison only Komala can break down.
Generation IX.Violet: A potent anesthetic can be made by diluting Komala's drool. This anesthetic was used for surgeries in the past.

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area One East Province: Area One , Area Two , Tagtree Thicket West Province: Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ )
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area One East Province: Area One , Area Two , Tagtree Thicket West Province: Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ )
